channel.title: Need massive help![delta]
channel.description: i need some massive help i have a problem when people send a trade request it dosent show up or anything why is that??? and how could i fix it!!!!!?

item.title: Need massive help![delta]
item.dc:creator: @norbit119 norbit119
item.description:
@norbit119 wrote:

public void tradeReq(int id) {
	if (!server.trading) {
		sM("Trading has been temporarily disabled");
		return;
	}
	client other = (client) handler.players[id];
	if (validClient(trade_reqId)) {
		if (other.inTrade || other.inDuel) {
			sM("Other player is busy at the moment.");
			trade_reqId = 0;
			return;
		}
	}

if(other.interfaceOpened){
int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absX;
int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absY;
TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);
sM(“Other player is busy at the moment.”);
return;
}
if(action == 0){
return;
}
if(other.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)){
sM(“Other player is busy at the moment.”);
return;
}
if(other.action == 0){
return;
}
if(other.playerRights == 0){
sM("");
return;
}
if(playerRights == 0){
sM("");
return;
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2009, 02:46:55 pm[/size][hr]thats what i found what do i change it to?
